description: Seems good but not sure do I want Chinese spying on me. Uninstall for now.

I hold my public opinions at this. Due to this being my first cyber attack and my first cold war that I noticed and participated in. Glad for the open sources provided by Linux, I will be waiting for the allies to clear the digital fog so we can see true and reunite with clarity of association. Also from my 7th day worth of exposure to coding being today, I have a strong feeling someone with extensive knowledge could really do some technological hardship to an individual if they felt so inclined.

Kylin is not supportive on Ubuntu.
It's totally unavailable!
Don't know how it works.
But It is no longer supportive on ubuntu/linux.
Thankyou!
